nodes.text: Zana's Tavern was a cantina on the planet Belderone. It was run by Zana, an older woman who had once had a relationship with a Jedi Knight, Flint Torul. Locals would stop by the place to have a drink before their shifts at the factory, and Zana was happy to accommodate them. Around 3 ABY, the Rebel heroes, Luke Skywalker, Lando Calrissian, Chewbacca, and Leia Organa came to the tavern to try to discover clues about what the Imperials were doing on Belderone. During their stay, they were attacked by assassins sent by General Andrid, but they were able to fend them off.

During the Battle of Belderone, an Imperial AT-AT broke loose from the battle, and rampaged through the city. The tavern was completely obliterated, and Zana was killed. Her son, Flint would discover her lifeless body among the wreckage of the tavern the next morning.
